review.reviewBody: Absolute best Indian food I've ever tasted and I've eaten at a lot of restaurants .  I'd give ten stars if I could .  Good portions , meats always fresh tasting !  I have tried many of there dishes and they never fail to impress me.  Thanks Chefs !!!

Chana Bhatura was average, the quality has decreased at this restaurant.  Used to be good.
VADA PAAV was pathetic, first of all for $6.95 we only received one vada pav.  most restaurants gibe 2 for that price.  not worth the value. Secondly the vada looked and tasted like it came from a frozen  box.  I would expect this to taste fresh.  
Please do something, quality and quantity has gone down.
Butter Chicken smells bad. It is stale and for sure , days old. Never expected this.
The Aloo Parantha and Gobhi Parantha  are too yummy and good in size and paneer Paneer Pakora (1 lb) are also good but mint sauce was missing with it
One of the best quality of Indian food at best price.
